main: ^This is my costumer! I'm done talking to you! Thief! What am I supposed to sell to him? Nothing?
bye: ^Goodbye. Come back when you need something!
seller: ^I'm selling axes here. Very handy for destroying big rocks. But for now I can't really sell you anything.
thief: ^Because someone is stealing my components to make axes! I'm telling you it's the chisel seller!
^Okay I understand. I will leave you to it.
^I will try to get to know what is happening here.
the_truth: ^Thanks. Tell me when you know anything.
lost_components: ^Oh I see. So that was the shovel seller at the end... Thank you.
